page.title: 01BILLINGSHURST
page.content: BILLINGSHURST IS A MEDIUM SIZED VILLAGE SITUATED 7 MILES SW OF HORSHAM AND 18 MILES SE OF GUILDFORD IN THE COUNTY OF WEST SUSSEX. IT COVERS AN AREA OF 7975 ACRES AND AT THE 1981 CENSUS THERE WAS A POPULATION OF 522O. THE VILLAGE HAS A RAILWAY STATION SERVING VICTORIA IN LONDON, AND THE SEASIDE RESORT OF BOGNOR REGIS. THERE IS A PARISH COUNCIL WITH 15 MEMBERS, AND ELECTIONS ARE HELD EVERY 4 YEARS. IN THIS PARTICULAR BLOCK THERE IS A LARGE QUANTITY OF AGRICULTURAL LAND AND A SMALL AMOUNT OF BOTH PRIVATE AND COUNCIL OWNED HOUSES. THERE ARE SEVERAL SMALL HAMLETS AND FARMS IN THE SURROUNDING AREA.
